title: AI, Corporate Reform Shape 2026 Trade Choices for Asia Investors
description: As global trade tensions ease, Asia’s policy reforms and domestic economic fundamentals will play a bigger role in investment decisions next year, money managers and analysts said.
content: As global trade tensions ease, Asia’s policy reforms and domestic economic fundamentals will play a bigger role in investment decisions next year, money managers and analysts said.
